meaningMnemonic: Throw this onto a number and you have yourself the number of <vocabulary>times</vocabulary> something has increased. For example, ３倍 means something increased "three fold."
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji. Omit the 〜 when writing out the answer, though. That just represents that there should be something before the kanji in this word when being used.
